body_html: Hi, I'm trying to build the standard TensorFlow C API (not the JNI API) on Android so I can build a standalone binary in Rust on Android, what would be the recommended way? I saw the contrib/android builds the JNI lib, should I simply do a cross-compile bazel build of //tensorflow:libtensorflow.so ?
body_text: Hi, I'm trying to build the standard TensorFlow C API (not the JNI API) on Android so I can build a standalone binary in Rust on Android, what would be the recommended way? I saw the contrib/android builds the JNI lib, should I simply do a cross-compile bazel build of //tensorflow:libtensorflow.so ?
body: Hi, I'm trying to build the standard TensorFlow C API (not the JNI API) on Android so I can build a standalone binary in Rust on Android, what would be the recommended way? I saw the `contrib/android` builds the JNI lib, should I simply do a cross-compile bazel build of `//tensorflow:libtensorflow.so` ?
